description: To Establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer to cover repeated, on-going Motorola VHF 2-way radio purchases for Parks Canada located in Calgary, AB.
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Notice Title
5P466-230001 - Radio Equipment

#### Notice Type
Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)

#### Solicitation Number
WS3893285928

#### Publication Date
2023-04-27

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-05-23 14:00:00 EDT

#### Amendment Number
1

#### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-04-14

#### Expected Contract End Date
None

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Goods or Services Required
Radio core equipment, radio access equipment, radio antennas, and radio frequency data communication equipment

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

#### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

#### Regions of Opportunity
None

#### Regions of Delivery
Calgary, Alberta

#### Contracting Entity Name
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contracting Entity Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

#### Contact Information
- Name: Keenan, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Description
The Government of Canada seeks to establish a regional individual standing offer to cover repeated and ongoing Motorola VHF 2-way radio purchases for Parks Canada located in Calgary, Alberta.

The standing offer will be limited to the part numbers listed below and will be in effect from the date of issuance for one year. Bidders must supply radio equipment as defined in the tables below on an “as and when requested” basis.

- Note: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-05-23 at 14:00 EDT. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16120030?extsite=MTYxMjAwMzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
